snippet: The city board of Helsinki, Finland, has shot down a proposal to build a $185 million Guggenheim Museum along the city's waterfront, Reuters reported on Wednesday.
abstract: The city board of Helsinki, Finland, has shot down a proposal to build a $185 million Guggenheim Museum along the city's waterfront, Reuters reported on Wednesday.

headline.main: Helsinki City Board Votes Against a Guggenheim Helsinki
headline.print_headline: Helsinki Narrowly Rejects Plan for a Guggenheim
